text: The men's marathon competition of the athletics event at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games was held on 7 June at the Kallang Practice Track in Singapore. ==Records== Prior to this competition, the existing Asian and Games records were as follows: {| class="wikitable" |- |Asian record | |2:06:16 |Chicago, United States |13 October 2002 |- |Games record | |2:20:27 |Jakarta, Indonesia |19 October 1997 |} ==Schedule== All times are Singapore Standard Time (UTC+08:00) {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! width=220|Date ! width=50|Time ! width=100|Event |- | Saturday, 7 June 2015 || 06:00 || bgcolor=ffffcc|Final |} ==Results== {| class="wikitable" style="margin:0.5em auto; font-size:90%; position:relative;" width=70% |- |KEY: |align=center|GR||Games record |align=center|NR||National record |align=center|PB||Personal best |align=center|SB||Seasonal best |align=center|DNF||Did not finish |} : {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" !width=40|Rank !width=250|Athletes !width=80|Time !width=50|Notes |- | || align=left| || 2:34:56 || |- | || align=left| || 2:35:09 || |- | || align=left| || 2:37:10 || |- | 4 || align=left| || 2:38:50 || |- | 5 || align=left| || 2:39:26 || |- | 6 || align=left| || 2:42:39 || |- | 7 || align=left| || 2:43:26 || |- | 8 || align=left| || 2:44:02 || |- | 9 || align=left| || 2:55:49 || |- | 10 || align=left| || 2:59:39 || |- | || align=left| || — || DNF |- | || align=left| || — || DNF |} ==References== ==External links== * Men's marathon Southeastasian 2015 Southeast Asian Games
title: Athletics at the 2015 Southeast Asian Games – Men's marathon
